# include<map>
# include<set>
# include<queue>
# include<stack>
# include<deque>
# include<math.h>
# include<vector>
# include<bitset>
# include<stdio.h>
# include<ctype.h>
# include<iostream>
# include<stdlib.h>
# include<string.h>
# include<algorithm>
# define si size
# define er erase
# define sc scanf
# define be begin
# define fr first
# define se second
# define pr printf
# define pb push_back
# define mp make_pair
# define INF 100000000
# define Int long long int
using namespace std;
int t,n,a,b,c,d,i,j,x,y,z;
main()
{
//freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
for(sc("%d",&t);t--;)
{
    x=0,y=0,z=INF;
    sc("%d%d%d%d%d",&n,&a,&b,&c,&d);
    for(i=0;i*b<=n;i++)
    {
        j=n-(i*b);
        if(j%d==0)
        {
            if(i*a+(j/d)*c<z){z=i*a+(j/d)*c;x=i;y=j/d;}
        }
    }
    pr("%d %d %d\n",x,y,(z==INF ? 0 : z));
}
return 0;
}
